ProjectTitle: Assembly and diversity of long-range inhibitory circuits in the brain
InitialFeedbackHistory:
05/07/2022
4. Documentation: You don't have to describe manuscripts in a DMP.  A collection of metadata standards that may be handy for your work are the MIBBI: https://fairsharing.org/3518, for example MINSEQE or MIFlowCyt. For microscopy you can consider using OME (https://fairsharing.org/FAIRsharing.cq8tg2). You may also find the arrive guidelines for reporting of animal experiments useful, journals often ask to follow these: https://arriveguidelines.org/. Finally, in sharing you mention DNAtraffic, does this platform add metadata?
label: good with suggestions
